name: part_006
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ卒業ライブ】あくあ色に染まれ！／MinatoAqua Graduation LIVE [fDtUy1PTor0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua and Houshou Marine perform the song 'Love Potion'.
Minato Aqua and Shirakami Fubuki perform the song 'Little Busters!'.

subtitles.original: 新しい星に
subtitles.english: To the new star

subtitles.original: 慣れたつもりでいたけど
subtitles.english: I thought I had gotten used to it

subtitles.original: なにか物足りない
subtitles.english: Something is missing

subtitles.original: 君の笑い声だった
subtitles.english: It was the sound of your laughter

subtitles.original: あれからどれくらい
subtitles.english: How much time has passed since then?

subtitles.original: カレンダーをめくったのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder how many calendar pages I've turned

subtitles.original: ひとりでは
subtitles.english: When I'm alone

subtitles.original: 帰り道
subtitles.english: On the way home

subtitles.original: 寄り道もしないから
subtitles.english: Since I don't take any detours

subtitles.original: 怒られない
subtitles.english: No one scolds me

subtitles.original: 涙が出るの
subtitles.english: And tears come out

subtitles.original: いっつだってそばにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'm always by your side

subtitles.original: だってもっと一緒にいたいの
subtitles.english: Because I want to be together more

subtitles.original: ずっとそっと見てるからね
subtitles.english: I'll always be watching you softly

subtitles.original: ふたりで描こう 人生日記
subtitles.english: Let's draw our life diary together

subtitles.original: ラブラブピポー ピッピハリピポー
subtitles.english: Love Love People, Pippi Happy People

subtitles.original: ラブラブピポー ピッピハリピポー
subtitles.english: Love Love People, Pippi Happy People

subtitles.original: ラブラブピポー ピッピハリピポー
subtitles.english: Love Love People, Pippi Happy People

subtitles.original: ラブラブピポー ピッピハリピポー
subtitles.english: Love Love People, Pippi Happy People

subtitles.original: ああああ
subtitles.english: Ahhhh

subtitles.original: いっつだってそばにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'm always by your side

subtitles.original: だってもっと一緒にいたいの
subtitles.english: Because I want to be together more

subtitles.original: ずっとそっと見てるからね
subtitles.english: I'll always be watching you softly

subtitles.original: ふたりで描こう 人生日記
subtitles.english: Let's draw our life diary together

subtitles.original: そうこのまま 時を越えて
subtitles.english: Yes, just like this, beyond time

subtitles.original: 誰の声も届かない場所へ
subtitles.english: To a place where no one's voice can reach

subtitles.original: ふたりだけの場所へ
subtitles.english: To a place just for the two of us

subtitles.original: ココロをつなぐ 人生日記
subtitles.english: A life diary that connects our hearts

subtitles.original: ふたりで描こう 人生日記
subtitles.english: Let's draw our life diary together

subtitles.original: ひとりが辛いから 二つの手をつないだ
subtitles.english: Because being alone is hard, we joined two hands

subtitles.original: ふたりじゃ寂しいから 輪になって手をつないだ
subtitles.english: Because just two of us is lonely, we joined hands in a circle

subtitles.original: きっとそれが幾千の力にもなり
subtitles.english: Surely that will become a strength of thousands

subtitles.original: どんな夢も断てる気がするんだ
subtitles.english: I feel like I can cut through any dream

subtitles.original: 高く飛べ 高く空へ
subtitles.english: Fly high, to the high sky

subtitles.original: 高く蹴れ 高く声を上げ
subtitles.english: Kick high, raise your voice high

subtitles.original: いつか挫けた その日の向こうまで
subtitles.english: To the other side of that day when I once gave up

subtitles.original: きみの声 忘れない 涙も忘れない
subtitles.english: I won't forget your voice, I won't forget the tears

subtitles.original: これから始まる
subtitles.english: It's starting from here

subtitles.original: 希望という名の未来を
subtitles.english: A future named hope

subtitles.original: その足は歩き出す
subtitles.english: Those feet start walking

subtitles.original: やがて来る過酷も
subtitles.english: Even the hardships that will eventually come

subtitles.original: みんなで作った輪は 大きくなりすぎて
subtitles.english: The circle we made together has grown too large

subtitles.original: 時にはきみがどこにいるのかも わからなくなって
subtitles.english: Sometimes I lose track of where you are

subtitles.original: そっと誰かがくれた 優しい言葉が
subtitles.english: The kind words someone gently gave me

subtitles.original: きみの物語 教えてくれたんだ
subtitles.english: Told me your story

subtitles.original: 腕をかき 風を切れ
subtitles.english: Pump your arms, cut through the wind

subtitles.original: 前を向き 涙が滲むほどに
subtitles.english: Look forward, until tears well up

subtitles.original: 真っ直ぐ この空を駆け抜けろ
subtitles.english: Run straight through this sky

subtitles.original: きみもひとり 僕もひとり
subtitles.english: You're alone, I'm alone

subtitles.original: みんなが孤独でいるんだ
subtitles.english: Everyone is lonely

subtitles.original: この輪の中で
subtitles.english: Inside this circle
